metadata.name: DeviceCredentialDeployment Execution
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of DeviceCredentialDeployment to hide a process from view

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\devicecredentialdeployment.exe')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of DeviceCredentialDeployment to hide a process from view
